mapper.select: select * from ( select h.*, row_number() over (PARTITION by h.seq order by h.writeDate) as cnt, c.sysname, c.oriname from (select rownum numrow, h.* from ( select * from house order by seq desc ) h ) h INNER join houseContent c on h.seq = c.houseSeq where numrow BETWEEN 1 and 15 order by c.seq ) where cnt = 1 order by seq desc
select seq, writer, title, to_char(writedate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as writedate, viewcount from house where seq = #{seq}
select count(*) from house where seq = ${seq} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.update: update house set viewcount = viewcount+1 where seq = #{seq}
